name: SagesAngel
_source: speak;Sages;Hm, you don't seem like the rest of these guys...
speak;Angel;What's that supposed to mean, huh?
speak;Sages;Oh, well you seem more, stylish! Of course!
speak;Sages;Well, we don't need to fight...
speak;Angel;Not much choice for me, y'know.|If I don't kill you, they'll kill me.
speak;Sages;Oh my... Why don't you join us?
speak;Angel;Me?|Well, you fancy kind aren't exactly my scene...
speak;Sages;Well, we do have gold to spare...
speak;Angel;I guess. I pledge allegiance to the bag.
speak;Sages;Welcome aboard, I am Prince Sages of Arcei.
speak;Angel;Wanted? Who wouldn't want all of this?|...|But yeah.
speak;Angel;Cool, now if you'll excuse me, these mid guys are gonna pay.
